# The `IndirectThunks.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Contains a base ThunkInserter class that simplifies injection of MI thunks as well as a default implementation of MachineFunctionPass wrapping several <code>ThunkInserter</code>s for targets to extend. <a href="#details">More...</a>

</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

Contains a base ThunkInserter class that simplifies injection of MI thunks as well as a default implementation of MachineFunctionPass wrapping several <code>ThunkInserter</code>s for targets to extend.

<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;INDIRECTTHUNKS&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;INDIRECTTHUNKS&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunction.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunctionpass-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunctionPass.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinemoduleinfo-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineModuleInfo.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/irbuilder-h">llvm/IR/IRBuilder.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/module-h">llvm/IR/Module.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class assists in inserting MI thunk functions into the module and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// rewriting the existing machine functions to call these thunks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// One of the common cases is implementing security mitigations that involve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// replacing some machine code patterns with calls to special thunk functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Inserting a module pass late in the codegen pipeline may increase memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// usage, as it serializes the transformations and forces preceding passes to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// produce machine code for all functions before running the module pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For that reason, ThunkInserter can be driven by a MachineFunctionPass by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// passing one MachineFunction at a time to its &#96;run(MMI, MF)&#96; method.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Then, the derived class should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; call createThunkFunction from its insertThunks method exactly once for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   each of the thunk functions to be inserted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; populate the thunk in its populateThunk method</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that if some other pass is responsible for rewriting the functions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the insertThunks method may simply create all possible thunks at once,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// probably postponed until the first occurrence of possibly affected MF.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Alternatively, insertThunks method can rewrite MF by itself and only insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the thunks being called. In that case InsertedThunks variable can be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to track which thunks were already inserted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In any case, the thunk function has to be inserted on behalf of some other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function and then populated on its own &quot;iteration&quot; later - this is because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// MachineFunctionPass will see the newly created functions, but they first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// have to go through the preceding passes from the same pass manager,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// possibly even through the instruction selector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME Maybe implement a documented and less surprising way of modifying</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       the module from a MachineFunctionPass that is restricted to inserting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       completely new functions to the module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Derived, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertedThunksTy = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter">ThunkInserter</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Derived &amp;getDerived() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">Derived &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A variable used to track whether (and possible which) thunks have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserted so far. InsertedThunksTy is usually a bool, but can be other types</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to represent more than one type of thunk. Requires an |= operator to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accumulate results.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  InsertedThunksTy InsertedThunks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Interface for subclasses to use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create an empty thunk function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The new function will eventually be passed to populateThunk. If multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// thunks are created, populateThunk can distinguish them by their names.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter/#a1a95b72d4c28ba76251171967da03b01"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter/#a1a95b72d4c28ba76251171967da03b01">createThunkFunction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a> &amp;MMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MachineFunctions aren&#39;t created automatically for the IR-level constructs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we already made. Create them and insert them into the module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF = MMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo/#a89ccc89e9bd5881953bd1524a0d29f84">getOrCreateMachineFunction</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A MachineBasicBlock must not be created for the Entry block; code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generation from an empty naked function in C source code also does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generate one.  At least GlobalISel asserts if this invariant isn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respected.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set MF properties. We never use vregs...</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Derived, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertedThunksTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter/#a547880d64e46c0d922e0bb0f0d7f5fb9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter/#a547880d64e46c0d922e0bb0f0d7f5fb9">ThunkInserter&lt;Derived, InsertedThunksTy&gt;::run</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a> &amp;MMI,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If MF is not a thunk, check to see if we need to insert a thunk.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3d142c9e7c066059e15232c56dec9e2e">getName</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2cd8968ff703aaeb395dcd63f6805ff1">starts&#95;with</a>(getDerived().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter/#a7d87c609ee113d729a15013e29da1030">getThunkPrefix</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only add thunks if one of the functions may use them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!getDerived().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thunkinserter/#a0e76d9a11bcf2f5bb6b8842ae88ebf9e">mayUseThunk</a>(MF))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The target can use InsertedThunks to detect whether relevant thunks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have already been inserted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Provide the way for insertThunks to notify us whether it changed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        the MF, instead of conservatively assuming it did.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InsertedThunks |= getDerived().insertThunks(MMI, MF, InsertedThunks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this &#42;is&#42; a thunk function, we need to populate it with the correct MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  getDerived().populateThunk(MF);</span></CodeLine>
